content: I'm excited to try out this recipe for chana masala. I've been experimenting with different spice blends and flavors, and I think I'll try adding some roasted cumin seeds and coriander seeds to give it an extra boost of flavor. I'll also make sure to simmer the sauce for at least 30 minutes to let all the flavors meld together. Do you have any recommendations for sides or accompaniments that would go well with chana masala?
